# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

set( MODULE_NAME "gui" )



#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********

add_executable( ${MODULE_NAME} ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} )
add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} dbmgr wxmsw29u wxpng wxzlib wxexpat comctl32)
target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} dbmgr wxmsw29u wxpng wxzlib wxexpat comctl32)
set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "GUI_BUILD_MODULE" )

#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED CONTENT ********
include_directories(
	${wxWidgetsPath}/include
	${wxWidgetsPath}/lib/gcc_lib/mswu
	${UDF_SOURCE_DIR}/common/src 
	${UDF_SOURCE_DIR}/dbmgr/src 
	src
	res
)
link_directories (
	${wxWidgetsPath}/lib/gcc_lib
	${UDF_BINARY_DIR}/lib
) 
#-L${wxWidgetsPath}/lib/gcc_lib

endif( LINUX )
